scripts.janus:build:
echo -e '🐲 Build Janus Docker-Container: 
' && docker build -t project_cold_way_web-rtc-service .
scripts.janus:syncConfigToHost:
echo -e '🐲 Sync config to Host Janus Docker-Container: 
' && bash janus.sh docker:syncConfigToHost
scripts.janus:up:novolumne:
echo -e '🐲 Run Janus Docker-Container: 
' && docker container run -d --name project_cold_way_web-rtc-service project_cold_way_web-rtc-service
scripts.janus:up:
echo -e '🐲 Run Janus Docker-Container: 
' && docker container run -d -v $(pwd)/conf:/opt/janus/etc/janus --name project_cold_way_web-rtc-service --network host project_cold_way_web-rtc-service
scripts.janus:start:
echo -e '🐲 Start Janus Docker-Container: 
' && docker container start project_cold_way_web-rtc-service
scripts.janus:stop:
echo -e '🐲 Stop Janus Docker-Container: 
' && docker container stop project_cold_way_web-rtc-service
scripts.janus:down:
echo -e '🐲 Down Janus Docker-Container: 
' && docker container rm project_cold_way_web-rtc-service
